property.name: text
property.value: This actor model the reception of a packet from the radio point of view. Once a packet is received, the actor wait a certain time before to deliver it to the mac layer. Moreover, here we can check if the packet is valid or what type it is

svg.text: The state machine that models the radio reception behavior

property.name: script
property.value:
# This is a template. import time import ptolemy.data class Main : "This actor takes a double value and format the double according to the format" def fire(self) :
dataToken = self.data.get(0) format = self.format.getToken().stringValue() formatted_double = format % dataToken.doubleValue() self.out.broadcast(ptolemy.data.StringToken(formatted_double)) return

property.name: text
property.value: Once the synchronization is true, the clock will start to fire and schedules are generated every TsSlotDuration
